title: WeightNorm not compatible with torch.nn.DataParallel
body_html:
WeightNormalization does not work, if DataParallel is used.

I have run https://github.com/kuangliu/pytorch-cifar/blob/master/main.py VGGNet with weight_norm -> all outputs in the batch were the same, no learning.
After commenting out line
net = torch.nn.DataParallel(net, device_ids=range(torch.cuda.device_count()))

network started to work
